question.text:
Match the following:
(i) Riboflavin (a) Beriberi
(ii) Thiamine (b) Scurvy
(iii) Pyridoxine (c) Glossitis
(iv) Ascorbic acid (d) Dermatitis

options.text: <math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>)</mo></math>

<math><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi><mo>)</mo><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi><mo>)</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>–</mo><mi mathvariant="normal"></mi><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">b</mi><mo>)</mo></math>
